post:
Choose MyRootPW to become your web hosting partner. 
The Shared Web-Hosting Offers take resources on a powerful Server with
SSD-Disks and are managed by the state of the art Control-Panel and more.

You will get 99.9% uptime guaranteed, **Free LetsEncrypt SSL** Certificates, 
**1 Click-Wordpress** Installations and more!

Choose between the **Netherlands** and **Austria** Locations! Starting at only 10 Euro per Year!


**Web-Hosting Plans:**

**Small**
**5 GB SSD** Storage
50 GB Traffic
5 User Accounts
1 MySQL Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 1 Website
=> Order this hosting Package: [**10 Euro / Year**](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/SmallHosting/?group_id=19&pricing_id=159  "**10 Euro / Year**")


**Medium**
**15 GB SSD** Storage
100 GB Traffic
10 User Accounts
2 MySQL Databases
1 Postgres Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 5 Website
=> Order this hosting Package: [**20 Euro / Year**](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/RegularHosting/?group_id=20&pricing_id=160 "**20 Euro / Year**")


**Large**
**30 GB SSD Storage**
200 GB Traffic
25 User Accounts
3 MySQL Databases
3 Postgres Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 10 Website
=> Order this hosting Package:  [**40 Euro / Year**](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/LargeHosting/?group_id=21 "**40 Euro / Year**")

_All prices excl. VAT if applicable._

[**Compare Plans on the Website**](https://myroot.pw/hosting.php "**Compare Plans on the Website**")



Visit our website https://myroot.pw/
Contact us support@myroot.pw
